column4: My instillation of Ubuntu is running rather slow, I installed from windows so I would have a side by side partition.
installin from windows willuse Wubi, using a file in your NTFS to store the data
can you give some system details please
did you install the additional driver?
not really, it just means you fully use all the features in the hardware
before you log in, click the ubuntu logo and change session
it uses metacity instead of compiz
not familiar, but i'll google it, thanks for the advice.
i just gave you all you need, what is there you need to look for?
So I know what the difference is between the two?
i'm not familiar with what metacity or compiz is.
compiz makes the desktop effects you see, metacity doesn't and uses fewer resources, italso doesn't require 3D accelleration to exist
i'd rather have the effects honestly... my setup should be able to handle it, i'm sure it's most likely because I installed using Wubi
using wubi doesn't change anything reall
if your ntfs is fragmented it may affect speed, otherwise it's the same
